title: How to Find & Talk to the Alchemist: Easy Blox Fruit Tutorial

steps.title: Go to the Green Zone.
steps.content: Go to the Green Zone. The Alchemist is in the Green Zone, which is connected to the Kingdom of Rose by a bridge. The Alchemist is slightly hidden, but he's not difficult to find. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Walk off of the bridge to the Green Zone.
steps.content: Walk off of the bridge to the Green Zone. Once you get off the bridge, go straight past the brown rock with a treasure chest next to it.

steps.title: Keep moving forward and go around the large stalk next to the rock.
steps.content: Keep moving forward and go around the large stalk next to the rock. You should see the Marine Quest Giver standing next to the base of a different stalk.

steps.title: Go between the stalk by the Marine Quest Giver and a brown rock.
steps.content: Go between the stalk by the Marine Quest Giver and a brown rock. The stalk will be to the right of the Marine Quest Giver. Keep walking a bit past the stalk and the brown rock.

steps.title: Turn around.
steps.content: Turn around. You should see a brown path that goes towards the stalk, and the trunk of a mushroom.

steps.title: Move towards the path and follow it to the backside of the stalk.
steps.content: Move towards the path and follow it to the backside of the stalk. The Alchemist is here, tucked away behind the stalk and the mushroom.

steps.title: Meet the prerequisites to talk to the Alchemist.
steps.content: Meet the prerequisites to talk to the Alchemist. In order to talk to the Alchemist, you must be at least level 850, and you must have completed the Colosseum Quest: Find and speak to Bartilo in the Cafe in the Kingdom of Rose. Kill 50 Swan Pirates. Swan Pirates are a level 775 enemy found in the Kingdom of Rose, near the Area 2 Quest Giver. [2] X Research source Return to Bartilo. He will ask you to kill Jeremy, a level 850 boss. Jeremy can be found on a plateau on top of the mountain near the Swan Pirates (in the Kingdom of Rose Area 2). Jeremy spawns every 20 minutes. [3] X Research source Return to Bartilo again. He will next ask you to save the Gladiators in the Colosseum. The Colosseum is near Don Swan's Mansion. Enter the secret code to complete the quest. The secret code is Y, âˆž, C, S, M, F, N, B . This code is found inside Don Swan's Mansion, but you don't need to find the code in game to enter it and complete the quest.
